summary: Container class that holds the results of the Mask2Former pixel decoder, including multi‑scale feature maps from the deformable attention decoder, high‑resolution mask features, and optionally the attention matrices for each decoder layer.
business_intent: Standardize the decoder output so that downstream segmentation components can reliably access multi‑scale visual representations and mask predictions, facilitating integration into computer‑vision pipelines that require detailed feature maps and optional attention diagnostics.
